text:
It's a well-known fact that first aid has been a revolution, and, is now indispensable.
Indeed, during the war, it have been very helpful to heal soldiers's wounds to avoid infections or even death. Lots of lives have been saved thanks to this.
Most of people think that if they help people who have a heart attack, they will make things worse and so they don't even try. That's why, in the everyday life, knowing how to perform the first aid cares is important because people can need help everywhere at anytime and people without medicine knowledge can save lives too.
 In my opinion, every people in the world should know how to perform first aid as the cardio-pulmonary resuscitation because problem can happen in front of each of us and it's important to help people in need. Thanks to this, even no-medical people can be useful and, perhaps, save some lives.
Personally, I don't know already how to perform first aid cares but, I will learn it in May and I'm very excited because after that, I will be useful in the everyday life and it's one of my goal.
To conclude, I would say that it's important to be curious about how to help people with minor cares. It seems hard to do but with some experience and trials, it can be easy and vital.
